definition: an illegal pitching motion while runners are on base, to refuse to comply
details:
noun
- an illegal pitching motion while runners are on base
- one of several parallel sloping beams that support a roof
= synonyms: rafter, baulk
- something immaterial that interferes with or delays action or progress
= synonyms: deterrent, check, hindrance, hinderance, impediment, baulk, handicap
- the area on a billiard table behind the balkline
= example: the area on a billiard table behind the balkline
= synonyms: baulk
verb
- to refuse to comply
= example: to refuse to comply
= synonyms: jib, baulk, resist
